snippet: The revenue that the investment bank Jefferies Group generated from trading bonds, currencies and commodities slumped 85 percent in the three months before September, a far bigger drop than its larger rivals across Wall Street are expecting.
abstract: The revenue that the investment bank Jefferies Group generated from trading bonds, currencies and commodities slumped 85 percent in the three months before September, a far bigger drop than its larger rivals across Wall Street are expecting.

headline.main: Jefferies' Results Reflect the Hazards of Fixed Income
